node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者本身有心臟長期病患，與兒子、媳婦、孫女一同居於住天后廟道飛龍台。 2 月 13 日咳嗽及發燒，之後未曾出外。2 月 22 日感到氣促及不適，到東區醫院檢驗後確診。與第 #65 宗個案患者同樣曾到北角書局街美輪大廈內一間名為「福慧精舍」的佛堂。沒有外遊紀錄。
node.detail_en: The patient, with chronic cardiovascular diseases, lives with her son, daughter-in-law and grand-daughter at Fly Dragon Terrace, Tin Hau Temple Road. She started having coughs and a fever on Feb 13 and had stayed in since then. She then developed shortness of breath on Feb 22 and thus sought treatment from Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital where she tested positive for coronavirus. Like patient no. 65, this patient has been to Fook Wai Ching She, a Buddhist preaching hall in Maylun Apartments, 23 Shu Kuk Street, North Point. She has no recent travel history.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: 天后廟道 26-32 號飛龍臺
node.location_en: Fly Dragon Terrace, 26-32 Tin Hau Temple Road
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 13 日起出現發燒及咳嗽。
node.remarks_en: Patient developed cough and fever on Feb 13.

node.location_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 22 日凌晨情況轉差，在東區醫院留醫接受治療，現時情況穩定。
node.remarks_en: Patient's condition worsened in the early morning on Feb 22 then admitted to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital. Currently in a stable condition.

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 病人 1 月底曾到福慧精舍，與早前第 65 宗個案前往同一間佛堂。
node.remarks_en: Patient visited Fook Wai Ching She at end of Jan.  No. 65 patient visited the same buddist preaching hall.
